mapper.select: SELECT * FROM u_member where userid = #{userid} and passwd = #{passwd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO u_member (userid, passwd, name, gender, phone1, phone2, phone3, birth_year, birth_month, birth_day) VALUES (#{userid}, #{passwd}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{phone1}, #{phone2}, #{phone3}, #{birth_year}, #{birth_month}, #{birth_day})
mapper.update: UPDATE u_member SET passwd = #{passwd}, name = #{name}, gender = #{gender}, phone1 = #{phone1}, phone2 = #{phone2}, phone3 = #{phone3}, birth_year = #{birth_year}, birth_month = #{birth_month}, birth_day = #{birth_day} where userid = #{userid}
